org.datavec.api.transform.transform.time

Class DeriveColumnsFromTimeTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.datavec.api.transform.transform.time.DeriveColumnsFromTimeTransform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Transform

    public class DeriveColumnsFromTimeTransform
extends java.lang.Object
implements Transform
    Create a number of new columns by deriving their values from a Time column. Can be used for example to create new columns with the year, month, day, hour, minute, second etc.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
